entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is experiencing strange attacks and is unsure if he is going mad.

entities.name: Ginny
entities.description: A person mentioned in the conversation between Harry and Riddle, who had a diary that was used by Riddle to manipulate her.

entities.name: Riddle
entities.description: The antagonist of the story, who is manipulating events from behind the scenes and is interested in meeting Harry.

entities.name: T om
entities.description: A person mentioned in Harry's conversation with himself, who seems to be a source of concern for Harry.

relationships.description: Riddle is interested in meeting Harry and has been manipulating events to achieve this goal.
Riddle manipulated Ginny through her diary, which was used to influence her actions.
